title: New: Brolin – Another Year
body:
So chances are he’ll end up soundtracking 2013’s John Lewis Christmas advert, but hey, not _every_ act who features on those adverts ends up sucking from the teet of capitalist robots… or whatever it is I’m supposed to say.

Bedroom producer **Brolin** has all the makings of the next success story a la **James Blake**, **Youth Lagoon** etc. with the appealing intimacy of new track _Another Year_ not quite matching the stunning beauty of his earlier work, but certainly showcasing the talent this guy has. Check out _Another Year_ below, and grab a free download whilst you can.
